original_text: Then Zedekiah the king sent, and took him out: and the king asked him secretly in his house, and said, Is there any word from the Lord? And Jeremiah said, There is: for, said he, thou shalt be delivered into the hand of the king of Babylon.
korean_text: 시드기야 왕이 사람을 보내어 그를 이끌어내고 왕궁에서 그에게 비밀히 물어 이르되 여호와께로부터 받은 말씀이 있느냐 예레미야가 대답하되 있나이다 또 이르되 왕이 바벨론의 왕의 손에 넘겨지리이다

sentences.original_text: and king asked him secretly in his house,
sentences.korean_translation: 왕은 자기 집에서 그를 은밀히 물어

sentences.original_text: Is there any word from the Lord?
thou shalt be delivered into hand of king of Babylon.
